name: Duck Duck Nuke
description:
Our Great Leader has tasked you with the defense of our great nation! He even designed the missile warning system that you will be using! What a great honor!

Is it a duck? Or is it a nuke? In Duck Duck Nuke, discern incoming targets between nuclear missiles and ducks, and last as long as you can! All while given easily one of the worst interfaces.

A simulation arcade game with a reference to the greatest northern American state.

Pumper Games 2018
